text: Émile Jamil Lahoud () (born 12 January 1936) is a Lebanese politician. He was President of Lebanon from 1998 to 2007. ==Honours== ===Foreign honours=== * : Grand Cross of the Order of Grimaldi (13 July 2001)Nomination by Sovereign Ordonnance n° 14950 of 13 July 2001 (French) ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Lebanon Category:Lebanese military people
title: Émile Lahoud
